sentence.text: In A549 lung cancer cells, which endogenously express cell surface receptor signaling pathway, the depletion of biological_process and detection of light stimulus involved in visual perception significantly reduced growth and invasion by downregulating response to molecule of bacterial origin-stimulated ERK phosphorylation, actin polymerization and the expression of genes related to metastasis.

entity.text: detection of light stimulus involved in visual perception
response to molecule of bacterial origin
